To get started, we load the required packages.

```{r}
#| warning: true 
#| output: true
rm(list = ls())

library(ggplot2); library(dplyr); library(stringr)
library(brms)
library(here) #For finding root directory
library(beepr) #alert sound when done modeling
```

OK we loaded the packages
```{r}
# Example: Bayesian linear regression
fit <- brm(
  formula = mpg ~ wt + cyl,   # model formula
  data = mtcars,              # dataset
  family = gaussian(),        # likelihood family
  chains = 2, iter = 2000     # sampling options
)

summary(fit)
```
